verbose_text: In breast carcinoma cells, Twist causes transcriptional repression of E-cadherin, alpha, beta and gamma-catenins, and stimulates the expression of mesenchymal cell markers like fibronectin, vimentin, alpha-smooth muscle actin and N-cadherin as well as the angiogenic factor VEGF XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR.
evidence: Twist causes transcriptional repression of E-cadherin, alpha, beta and gamma-catenins, and stimulates the expression of mesenchymal cell markers like fibronectin, vimentin, alpha-smooth muscle actin and N-cadherin as well as the angiogenic factor VEGF
